title: Werewolf By Night + Appearances
description:
Here's my Christmas gift to the Bay and nothing sends out more Christmas cheer than a werewolf howling at the moon! :D

This is the the complete appearances of Jack Russell, aka Werewolf By Night, and includes an updated chronological reading order.

Upon reaching the age of 18 Jack fell heir to a family curse of lycanthropy. Every night of the full moon he would turn into a rampaging, uncontrollable werewolf. Werewolf by Night's creators were Gerry Conway who scripted his first few adventures, and artist Mike Ploog. Ploog, who had previously worked in animation, was unknown in comics when Werewolf started, but quickly made a name for himself in that medium.

Issue #32 of Werewolf by Night Volume 1 is notable for containing the first appearance of Moon Knight and Giant Size Creatures #1, which was the first appearance of Greer Grant as Tigra.

Werewolf by Night, Volume 2 ran for 6 issues. The series was written by Paul Jenkins and penciled by Leonardo Manco. After the book's cancellation, the story was continued in the pages of Strange Tales Volume 4.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
